mapper.select: select smpcs.id, smpcs.type, sc.name typeName, smpcs.cash_price, smpcs.integral_price, smpcs.icon, smpcs.back_img, smpcs.is_enabled, smpcs.is_deleted, smpcs.created_by, smpcs.created_time, smpcs.modified_by, smpcs.modified_time from sys_member_privilege_card_setting smpcs left join sys_code sc on sc.is_deleted = 0 and sc.value = smpcs.type where smpcs.id = #{id} and smpcs.is_deleted = 0
